title: Dudu8811
author: Dudu8811
content: Hi I need quickly for maybe a day 20 USD  in LTCGiving this nft WAGMI Genesis Silver NFT for Wagmicasinohttps://www.wagmicasino.io/wagmi-nft/utilitiesWill adjust the sell offer to 1 USD in return so you can accept the openea offer and keep it till inpatient back I pay back.Anyone interested ?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Dudu8811 on June 15, 2023, 06:37:32 PM[..snip...]Whatever the NFT is, basically you want to sell it for 20 USD. That's it?

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: NFTs don't mean anything if they can't attract a willing buyer. And the scene is pretty much dead.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Just sell the NFT instead if you think it's worth $40. If you can't manage to get a buyer at that price or even at $20 means that even the lender may not be able to recover his money by selling the NFT just in case you default the loan.You know how hard it is to find a buyer.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 20, 2023, 11:55:52 PMYou know how hard it is to find a buyer.Haha!  Understatement of the year.  That's why he was hoping to find a sucker to give him $20 for it.
